title: Constant CO2 level at end of EC-Earth3-Veg 1pctCO2 r1i1p1f1
description:
The CO2 concentration in the 1pctCO2 experiment was increased by 1% per year but only until the CO2 concentrations reached the 4xCO2 level (141 yrs), after that it remained constant.
The data will be retracted and republished
